overview: An emotional and gripping look at the attacks and the aftermath through the eyes, and the cameras, of six New Yorkers. Amid the terror and the chaos of that September 11th, these filmmakers, amateurs and professionals, grabbed their cameras and hit the streets.
tagline: Amid the terror and the chaos of that September 11th, these filmmakers, amateurs and professionals, grabbed their cameras and hit the streets.
title: Witness 9/11
